Greet{G782} Priscilla{G4252} and{G2532} Aquila{G207} my{G3450} helpers{G4904} in{G1722} Christ{G5547} Jesus{G2424}:

Who{G3748} have{G5294} for{G5228} my{G3450} life{G3588} laid down{G5294} their own{G1438} necks{G5137}: unto whom{G3739} not{G3756} only{G3441} I{G1473} give thanks{G2168}, but{G235} also{G2532} all{G3956} the churches{G3588} of the Gentiles{G3588}.

Likewise{G2532} greet the church{G1577} that is in{G2596} their{G846} house{G3624}. Salute{G782} my{G3450} wellbeloved{G27} Epaenetus{G1866}, who{G3739} is{G2076} the firstfruits{G536} of Achaia{G3588} unto{G1519} Christ{G5547}.

Now{G1161} I beseech{G3870} you{G5209}, brethren{G80}, mark{G4648} them which cause{G4160} divisions{G3588} and{G2532} offences{G3588} contrary to{G3844} the doctrine{G3588} which{G3739} ye{G5210} have learned{G3129}; and{G2532} avoid{G1578} them{G846}.

For{G1063} they that are such{G5108} serve{G1398} not{G3756} our{G2257} Lord{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, but{G235} their own{G1438} belly{G2836}; and{G2532} by{G1223} good words{G3588} and{G2532} fair speeches{G2129} deceive{G1818} the hearts{G3588} of the simple{G172}.

For{G1063} your{G5216} obedience{G5218} is come abroad{G864} unto{G1519} all{G3956} men. I am glad{G5463} therefore{G3767} on{G1909} your{G5213} behalf{G1909}: but yet{G1161} I would have{G2309} you{G5209} wise{G4680} unto{G1519} that which is good{G18}, and{G1161} simple{G185} concerning{G1519} evil{G2556}.

Timotheus{G5095} my{G3450} workfellow{G4904}, and{G2532} Lucius{G3066}, and{G2532} Jason{G2394}, and{G2532} Sosipater{G4989}, my{G3450} kinsmen{G4773}, salute{G782} you{G5209}.

In my printed copy it is rendered thus: Written to the Romans from Corinthus, <FI>and sent<Fi> by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
